LanguageData.Cults_OathtakerHastur.degreeDatas.0.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] has made an unbreakable contract. [PAWN_pronoun] will return from the dead to serve the King in Yellow that rules the lost city of Carcosa.
LanguageData.Cults_OathtakerHastur2.degreeDatas.0.des: [PAWN_nameDef] has risen from the dead to serve once again.
